entry.title: Our On-going Project Featured on YNU’s Homepage
entry.content:
Recently, [Yokohama National University (YNU) published a feature newsletter](https://www.econ.ynu.ac.jp/education/dsep/soma.html) on the university’s official website highlighting the work my colleagues, my professor, and I have been doing to visualize Japan’s macroeconomic data.
